P

playerProgression(String, String) - Method in class com.yerdy.services.Yerdy
Logs a player progression event.
purchasedInApp(YRDPurchase) - Method in class com.yerdy.services.Yerdy
Tracks in-app purchases (IAP) when in-game currency is not rewarded
If the in-app purchase was for in-game currency, use Yerdy.purchasedInApp(YRDPurchase, Map) or Yerdy.purchasedInApp(YRDPurchase, String, int) instead.
purchasedInApp(YRDPurchase, String, int) - Method in class com.yerdy.services.Yerdy
Tracks in-app purchases (IAP) when in-game currency is rewarded
If the in-app purchase not for in-game currency, use Yerdy.purchasedInApp(YRDPurchase) instead.
purchasedInApp(YRDPurchase, Map<String, Integer>) - Method in class com.yerdy.services.Yerdy
Tracks in-app purchases (IAP) when in-game currency is rewarded
If the in-app purchase not for in-game currency, use Yerdy.purchasedInApp(YRDPurchase) instead.
purchasedItem(String, String, int) - Method in class com.yerdy.services.Yerdy
Tracks in-game item purchase, short version if purchase only required a single currency
purchasedItem(String, Map<String, Integer>) - Method in class com.yerdy.services.Yerdy
Tracks in-game item purchase,
purchasedItem(String, String, int, boolean) - Method in class com.yerdy.services.Yerdy
Tracks in-game item purchase, short version if purchase only required a single currency, allows specification if price was regular pricing or sale price
